name: Curling the Herd
description:
Made for the Weekly Game Jam - Week 226 with the topic being curling.

Controls:

  • W,A,S,D - Movement
  • E - Talk to NPC
  • Mouse Click - Choose Dialogue options
  • Mouse Click - Shoot and Reload

Notes:

  • You will need to talk to the Fox and do the tutorial to continue (Walk towards him and press E to interact then click to choose dialog options)
  • The crosshair tells you how much ammo you have!

Known Bugs (Sorry):

  • There are a couple bugs with the dialog hitbox being triggered if you spam e outside of it
  • If you dont press e to break out of it the dialogEndTrigger doesn't get updated??
  • Other stuff I have missed
